creator: matthew.sgarlata@verizon.net
text:
The SQL task can be used to compile PL/SQL packages to an Oracle database.  
However, to do so the delimiter attribute must be set to the value "row".  The 
different valid values for the delimiter attribute are not documented.  It 
would be nice to add documentation for all values, and mention that setting the 
delimiter value to "row" will help with compiling packages to databases.
Hmm, delimiterType has been documented since svn revision 273672 which should be part of 1.6.0 if not even 1.5.x.  I'm not sure what is missing here.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
matt.sgarlata@spiderstrategies.com
text: I filed this bug report more than 4 years ago, and shortly after I filed it I switched jobs and haven't used the SQLTask again.  So, I don't know what's missing anymore either!  Probably best to just close this out.
